T16D4397:328a-0: @328a ` // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs kyi smon lam bzhugs /
T16D4397:328a-2: # // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T16D4397:328a-3: stong phrag brgya pa la sogs pa klog gi dus
T16D4397:328a-4: su smon lam du gsol pa /
T16D4397:328a-5: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag na /
T16D4397:328a-6: ston pa bla na med pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
T16D4397:328a-8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa /
T16D4397:328a-11: ma 'dres pa'i chos kyis brgyan pa /
T16D4397:328a-12: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la
T16D4397:328a-13: ston pa dam pa'i 'du shes kyis gus par phyag
T16D4397:328a-14: 'tshal zhing dang bas skyabs su mchi'o //
T16D4397:328a-15: bstan pa bla na med pa dam pa'i chos ngo
T16D4397:328a-16: bo nyid kyis rnam par dag cing rang bzhin gyis
T16D4397:328a-18: 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul /
T16D4397:328a-19: rnam grangs byis pa lta bu'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa /
T16D4397:328a-21: dus gsum gyi 'phags pa thams cad gshegs pa'i shul
T16D4397:328a-22: lam gyi chos 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyis
T16D4397:328a-23: bsdus pa dang / bstan pa'i chos skyes bu chen po'i dpal gyi mgur nas legs par gsungs pa /
T16D4397:328a-27: don bzang zhing tshig 'bru gsal ba /
T16D4397:328a-29: nges par legs pa'i lam du gyur pa /
T16D4397:328a-30: mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa bstan bcos la sogs
T16D4397:328a-31: pa dam pa'i chos yi ge 'bru gnyer gyis bsnyad
T16D4397:328a-32: pa thams cad la bstan pa dam pa'i 'du shes
T16D4397:328a-33: kyis gus par phyag 'tshal zhing dang bas skyabs su
T16D4397:328a-34: mchi'o // sgrub pa bla na med pa /
T16D4397:328b-0: 'phags @328b pa'i dge 'dun byang chub sems dpa' sems
T16D4397:328b-1: dpa' chen po 'jigs pa lnga las shin tu 'das
T16D4397:328b-2: pa / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i go 'phang brnyes pa /
T16D4397:328b-3: sa chen po la rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis rim par bzhugs pa /
T16D4397:328b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi sras /
T16D4397:328b-5: 'gro ba yongs kyi dpal mgon du gyur cing /
T16D4397:328b-6: sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la brtson pa sku nyams su bzhes pa rnams dang /
T16D4397:328b-7: 'phags pha rang sangs rgyas rang gi shes rab kyi rtsal gyis go zhing /
T16D4397:328b-8: bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pas rdzu 'phrul gyis don mdzad pa rnams dang /
T16D4397:328b-9: nyan thos dgra bcom pa gnas brtan chen po mchog
T16D4397:328b-10: bcu drug la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs
T16D4397:328b-13: rang gi don rjes su thob pa /
T16D4397:328b-14: srid par kun du sbyor ba /
T16D4397:328b-16: shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin gyi cha las rnam par grol ba /
T16D4397:328b-17: lha dang mi'i 'jig rten kun gyis mchod cing phyag
T16D4397:328b-18: bya bar 'os pa thams cad la dge ba'i bshes
T16D4397:328b-19: gnyen dang mchod gnas dam pa'i 'du shes kyis gus
T16D4397:328b-20: par phyag 'tshal zhing dang bas skyabs su mchi'o //
T16D4397:328b-21: khyad par du yang dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum /
T16D4397:328b-22: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T16D4397:328b-23: phyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa
T16D4397:328b-25: sras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang /
T16D4397:328b-26: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mtha' yas pa
T16D4397:328b-27: dang bcas pa thams cad bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi
T16D4397:328b-29: mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad lus dang ngag
T16D4397:328b-30: dang yid rab tu dang bas gus par phyag 'tshal
T16D4397:328b-32: dkon mchog gsum 'khor mtha' yas pa dang bcas pa
T16D4397:328b-33: phyag gi gnas bsod nams thams cad kyi dpal gyi
T16D4397:328b-34: zhing mthu dang yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab ba
T16D4397:328b-35: thams cad la bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas mchod
T16D4397:329a-0: dkon mchog gsum mchod gnas de dag thams @329a * //
T16D4397:329a-1: cad la mchod par dbul ba /
T16D4397:329a-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
T16D4397:329a-3: chos kyi dbyings rtogs par gyur pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ba /
T16D4397:329a-4: gser gyi padma 'dab ma stong dang /
T16D4397:329a-5: gzhan yang mchod pa bla na med pa dang /
T16D4397:329a-6: bla na med pa'i lha'i me tog dang /
T16D4397:329a-14: ba dan dag gis rim gror bgyi'o //
T16D4397:329a-18: gzhan yang skad cig thang cig yud tsam la stong
T16D4397:329a-19: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
T16D4397:329a-20: rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin du kun
T16D4397:329a-22: me tog gi si lam sna tshogs kyis kun du gang ba dang /
T16D4397:329a-24: chun po mang po kun du bres pa dang /
T16D4397:329a-25: snod sna tshogs nas bdug spos mang po 'thul ba dang /
T16D4397:329a-26: dpag bsam gyi shing mang po'i yal ga'i rtse mo g-yur za ba dang /
T16D4397:329a-31: bdug spos sna tshogs kyi shing sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun nas gnas par gyur pa /
T16D4397:329a-32: bla na ma mchis pa mchod par 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol lo //
T16D4397:329a-33: da ltar gyi mchod pa rnam pa lnga la sogs pa dngos su 'byor pa rnams kyang /
T16D4397:329a-34: lha dang mi'i mchod pa khyad par can rgya chen
T16D4397:329a-35: por sprul pas yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T16D4397:329a-37: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang /
T16D4397:329a-38: sras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mngon sum dang 'dra bar dmigs te /
T16D4397:329a-39: mchod par dbul gyis bzhes su gsol lo //
T16D4397:329a-40: bdag gir mdzad du gsol lo //
T16D4397:329a-41: longs spyad nas mnyes shing dbyes pa chen por mdzad du gsol lo //
T16D4397:329a-43: 'khor ba thog ma mchis pa nas /
T16D4397:329a-44: yang dag pa'i don ma mthong ste /
T16D4397:329a-45: phyin ci log gis bslad nas /
T16D4397:329a-46: sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mtshams med pa lnga dang /
T16D4397:329a-47: de dang nye ba lnga dang /
T16D4397:329b-0: me dge @329b bcu spyod pa dang /
T16D4397:329b-1: 'phags pa la skur pa btab pa dang /
T16D4397:329b-2: dam pa'i chos spong ba'i las bgyis pa dang /
T16D4397:329b-3: sems can gzhan la gnod pa'i las rnam pa mang po bgyis pas /
T16D4397:329b-4: 'khor ba dang ngan song gi rgyur gyur cing /
T16D4397:329b-5: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgrib par gyur pa /
T16D4397:329b-6: sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci bgyis so 'tshal
T16D4397:329b-7: thams cad mi 'chab mi sbed par gnod zhing 'gyod
T16D4397:329b-8: pa'i sems kyis ma lus par mthol zhing bshags so
T16D4397:329b-9: // 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa /
T16D4397:329b-10: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyis bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur pa /
T16D4397:329b-11: rnam par dkar ba'i phyogs thams cad la shin tu
T16D4397:329b-12: rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi
T16D4397:329b-13: rang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag dam
T16D4397:329b-14: pa'i chos btsun par mdzad pa'i slad du nang du
T16D4397:329b-16: chos kyi 'khor lo mi bskor zhing bskul ba'i sa
T16D4397:329b-17: la gzhes pa de dag la yang chos kyi 'khor
T16D4397:329b-18: lo rnam pa bcu gnyis bden pa bzhi'i tshul du
T16D4397:329b-19: bskor nas dam pa'i chos bdud rtsi'i char dbab par
T16D4397:329b-21: bde bar gshegs pa gang dag gdul bya rnams kyi don mdzad nas /
T16D4397:329b-22: 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag cing /
T16D4397:329b-23: 'byor pa thams cad rgud par bstan te /
T16D4397:329b-24: 'jig rten mi rtag par bstan pa'i slad du /
T16D4397:329b-25: rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig nas /
T16D4397:329b-26: thabs kyis mya ngan 'da' ba'i tshul ston par bzhed
T16D4397:329b-27: pa de dag la yang thugs rje chen po'i gzugs
T16D4397:329b-28: kyis 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du mya ngan
T16D4397:329b-30: 'jig rten na yun ring por bzhugs nas /
T16D4397:329b-31: lha dang mi'i ston pa dang /
T16D4397:329b-32: dge ba'i bshes gnyen du bzhugs par gsol ba 'debs so //
T16D4397:329b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag gis sems can ma
T16D4397:329b-34: lus pa'i don du bla na med pa'i byang chub
T16D4397:329b-35: tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du /
T16D4397:329b-36: bdag gis kyang dus thams cad dang gnas thams cad du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol te /
T16D4397:329b-37: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T16D4397:330a-1: 'tshal ba nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
T16D4397:330a-2: srung ma thugs dam can mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
T16D4397:330a-3: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /
T16D4397:330a-4: rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa 'khor mtha' yas pa dang bcas pa /
T16D4397:330a-6: chos thos pa bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs pa /
T16D4397:330a-7: lha'i dge bsnyen chen po de dag la chos dang
T16D4397:330a-8: zang zing gi longs spyod rgya chen po bstabs shing
T16D4397:330a-9: phul ba dang / 'gro ba ris khams gsum gyis bsdus pa /
T16D4397:330a-11: 'gro ba ris drug tu skye gnas rnam pa bzhi las skyes pa /
T16D4397:330a-12: ji tsam sems can gyi ris na mchis pa /
T16D4397:330a-13: sems can bsdu bar bsdus pa thams cad la yang
T16D4397:330a-14: bsdu ba rnam pa bzhis bsdus pa'i mchod sbyin gyi
T16D4397:330a-15: gtor ma rgya chen pos khyab par bsngos pa dang
T16D4397:330a-16: / tshe rabs brgyud pa nas lan chags par gyur pa'i bgegs rnams la yang /
T16D4397:330a-19: longs spyod ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma rgya chen po bsngos shing stsal ba /
T16D4397:330a-20: de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
T16D4397:330a-21: gzhan yang bdag cag gi snga slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis so 'tshal gyi mthu dang /
T16D4397:330a-22: khyad par du yang yum shes rab kyi pha rol
T16D4397:330a-23: tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa la sogs te
T16D4397:330a-24: / shes rab rnam gsum gyi don du gsungs pa'i phyogs /
T16D4397:330a-25: g-yo sgyu med par bris pa dang /
T16D4397:330a-27: mchod cing rim gro bgyis pa dang ;
T16D4397:330a-30: lha dang drang srong la sogs pa rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang /
T16D4397:330a-31: bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis /
T16D4397:330a-32: bdag cag gis mchod pa bshams pa'i gnas 'di /
T16D4397:330a-33: sngon bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la /
T16D4397:330a-34: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du /
T16D4397:330a-35: yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher bstan cing bshad pa de bzhin du /
T16D4397:330a-36: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par gyur
T16D4397:330a-37: cig / yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T16D4397:330b-0: pa dang / @330b sras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang bcas pa /
T16D4397:330b-1: pho brang gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i gnas 'dir spyan drangs te /
T16D4397:330b-5: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhung dang /
T16D4397:330b-6: dngos grub kyi cho ga dang /
T16D4397:330b-7: mchod pa la sogs pa'i dbang dang /
T16D4397:330b-8: byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa
T16D4397:330b-9: dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad tshe rabs
T16D4397:330b-11: las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad ni byang /
T16D4397:330b-13: mi khom brgyad la sogs pa sdug bsngal thams cad las ni yang dag par grol zhing thar te /
T16D4397:330b-14: bde 'gro lha'i 'jig rten du skyes nas 'phags pa thams cad kyi zhal mngon sum du mthong ste /
T16D4397:330b-15: phyag g-yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas bdag gi spyi bor bzhag ste /
T16D4397:330b-16: rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zhes bgyi bar /
T16D4397:330b-17: sangs rgyas 'di lta bu zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa myur du thob nas /
T16D4397:330b-18: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su myur du 'grub
T16D4397:330b-19: par gyur cig / sangs rgyas su ma grub kyi
T16D4397:330b-20: bar du 'jig rten 'di dag tu yang /
T16D4397:330b-21: tshe ring nad med longs spyod 'phel /
T16D4397:330b-22: rigs rgyud rgyas shing bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa
T16D4397:330b-23: dang ldan par gyur cig / mi dang mi ma
T16D4397:330b-24: yin pa la sogs pa dgra bgegs bar du gcod
T16D4397:330b-25: pa cis kyang mi tshugs shing /
T16D4397:330b-26: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam pa
T16D4397:330b-27: thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par gyur cig /
T16D4397:330b-28: khyad par du yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T16D4397:330b-29: phyin pa la / chos spyod rnam pa bcu'i sgo
T16D4397:330b-30: nas tshul bzhin bgyis pa'i phan yon bsam gyis mi
T16D4397:330b-31: phyin pa la / khyab na yang / mdor bsdus pa bcu ste /
T16D4397:330b-32: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sras su dgongs shing /
T16D4397:330b-33: byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ba dang /
T16D4397:330b-34: tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa'i srung ma
T16D4397:330b-35: khyad par can rnams kyis bu bzhin du skyong bar
T16D4397:330b-36: 'gyur ba dang / tshe dang dbang / phyug phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /
T16D4397:331a-1: la sogs pa gdon thams cad kyi bsam sbyor ngan pas mi tshugs pa dang /
T16D4397:331a-2: gza' skar dang rmi ltas la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /
T16D4397:331a-3: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ba dang /
T16D4397:331a-4: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan
T16D4397:331a-5: thams cad bos pa bzhin du 'du bar 'gyur ba
T16D4397:331a-6: dang / tshe rabs thams cad du shes rab kyi
T16D4397:331a-7: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don dang mi skol bar
T16D4397:331a-8: dang / 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal mngon sum du mthong ba dang /
T16D4397:331a-9: mthar bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su grub par
T16D4397:331a-10: 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs mtha'
T16D4397:331a-11: yas shing rmad du byung ba rnams bdag cag 'khor
T16D4397:331a-12: dang bcas pa la smin cing grub par gyur cig
T16D4397:331a-13: / khyad par du yang bod kyi rgyal khams su
T16D4397:331a-14: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring por bzhugs par
T16D4397:331a-15: gyur cig /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T16D4397:331a-16: phyin pa bzhugs pa'i yul phyogs su yang ngan sems
T16D4397:331a-18: mi nad dang phyugs nad rgyun chad pa dang /
T16D4397:331a-20: char chu dus su phebs bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te /
T16D4397:331a-21: sems can thams cad dge ba spyod pa'i bsam pa
T16D4397:331a-22: bzang po dang ldan par gyur cig / sangs rgyas
T16D4397:331a-23: kyi bstan pa la zhe sdang ba'i gang zag log
T16D4397:331a-24: sred can bstan pa gzhig pa'i ngan sems dang ldan
T16D4397:331a-25: pa rnams ni chu shing gi rtsa ba bzhin du
T16D4397:331a-26: gyur cig / dkon mchog gsum la dad cing dam
T16D4397:331a-27: pa'i chos bsrung ba'i bsam pa bzang po dang ldan
T16D4397:331a-28: pa'i gang zag rnams ni tshe ring zhing bsam pa
T16D4397:331a-29: thams cad yid bzhin du grub par gyur cig /
T16D4397:331a-30: bdag dang sems can thams cad rnam pa kun tu
T16D4397:331a-31: / dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin rlabs dang //
T16D4397:331a-32: dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum gyi mthu byin gyis //
T16D4397:331a-33: gang dang gang na ji ltar gnas pa yi //
T16D4397:331a-34: sgrib dang sdug bsngal ma lus kun bsal te //
T16D4397:331a-35: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus rab bsnyil nas //
T16D4397:331b-0: rgyud drug 'gro ba ma lus kun @331b bsgral te //
T16D4397:331b-1: kun du bzang po'i spyod pas bsgrubs pa'i zhing //
T16D4397:331b-2: rin chen mdzes pa rnam bkod bde ba can //
T16D4397:331b-3: bdud rtsi'i mtsho dang dpag bsam shing dang ldan //
T16D4397:331b-4: der 'byung skal ldan padma'i mchog las skyes //
T16D4397:331b-5: yid bzhin phun sum tshogs pa 'phags pa'i sa //
T16D4397:331b-6: rnam dag khyad par can gyi gnas mchog der //
T16D4397:331b-7: thogs med rdzus te bde bar gshegs gyur nas //
T16D4397:331b-8: mtshan tsam thos pas sgrib pa rnam sel ba //
T16D4397:331b-9: rin chen 'od 'bar sku mchog 'gro ba'i skyabs //
T16D4397:331b-10: tshe dang longs spyod dpag med sbyin pa'i gtso //
T16D4397:331b-11: snang ba mtha' yas 'gro don mngon sum ste //
T16D4397:331b-12: de las mchog thob lung bsten dbang bskur nas //
T16D4397:331b-13: rgyal sras gnyis dang spyod pa'i blo mthun zhing //
T16D4397:331b-14: phyogs bcur 'gro la phan pa'i don mdzad nas //
T16D4397:331b-15: srid gsum yongs kyi skyabs su gyur par shog /'phags
T16D4397:331b-16: pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs
